Package ca.krasnay.sqlbuilder.orm

Interface Summary
Converter<T> Interface that defines conversions of a domain value to and from a field in ResultSet.
ConverterFactory Factory for returning a converter given a Java field type.
IdSource Interface to generate unique IDs for primary keys.
IdSourceFactory Object that returns an IdSource object for a particular mapping.
 

Class Summary
Column Maps a column in the database to a corresponding field in a Java class.
DateTimeConverter  
DefaultConverter Converter that takes objects as is and does not perform any conversions beyond JDBC
DefaultConverterFactory  
EnumStringConverter<E> Converts String fields to and from particular enum
LocalDateConverter  
LocaleConverter Converts between a Locale object and a string.
Mapping<T> A mapping maps a Java class to a database table and the fields in the class to columns in the table.
OrmConfig Configuration of the ORM system.
PostgresqlSequenceIdSource  
ReflectionUtils  
StringConverter Converts to a string for database storage.
StringListConverter Converter for a list of strings that stores the list in the database as a comma-separated list.
StringListFlattener Flattens a list of strings into a single string using a separator char.
StringMapConverter Converter for a list of strings that stores the list in the database as a comma-separated list.
TimestampConverter Converts java.util.Date and java.sql.Timestamp to java.sql.Timestamp
 

Exception Summary
OptimisticLockException Gets thrown when record was updated by somebody else in the time span between reading entity and updating it.
RowNotFoundException Gets thrown when there is no entries in the table identified by specific id
SingleResultException Exception thrown when more than one record is returned in response to a query expected to produce only one result
